issue.title: [CF 545] 6.0.1 - Icon Condition Colors Messed Up
issue.body:
I had my color conditions set up correctly, e.g. Missing Flame Shock debuff is greyscale, Present Flame Shock is full color. Version 6.0.1 broke this functionality. 1 of the color conditions will work and the other wont, usually just grey all the time. I'm using Finished, Always Shown with a white color and grey boxed checked for missing debuffs and I'm using Counting, Timer Shown, Always Shown with a white box and grey box not check for full color when the debuff is ticking. This broke upon update. It affects my totem tracking icon too.


> Posted by CurseForge user lotsoftoons | Imported from CurseForge issue #545 | Raw

comments.body:
Please do not ignore the ticket template that is provided. You will need to resubmit your ticket, complete with the requested export strings, before I will be able to help you with this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
